reviewText: Can't play Region 2...ONE copy? What's up with that? Where can I buy a copy in a format I can play? Saw this once on TV and want to own it.

Just watched the whole season on Netflix.  I was hooked after the first show.
A real gem.  Wish there were many seasons to watch- apparently only this one.

Don't miss it if you love excellent acting and an a brilliant script.

Brilliant series with an all-star cast. Clever adaptation of Zadie Smith's wonderful novel.
A must see for those who enjoy something a little different and interested in cultural clashes.
